why: To automatically organize test files by moving them to appropriate /tests directories in each main project folder
name: Test Files Auto-Organizer
description: Automatically moves newly created test files (.test.js, .test.ts, .spec.js, .spec.ts, test-*.js, test-*.ts, *.test.*, *.spec.*) to the appropriate /tests directory based on their location in the project structure
outputPrompt:
A new test file has been created. Please move it to the appropriate /tests directory based on its location:

- If in backend/ folder → move to backend/tests/
- If in admin-dashboard/ folder → move to admin-dashboard/tests/
- If in hospital-management-system/ folder → move to hospital-management-system/tests/
- If in root directory → move to backend/tests/ (as the main testing location)

Ensure the /tests directory exists before moving the file. Preserve the original filename and notify about the organization.
